Interface ElementHTMLMethods<E extends Element, B extends TypedBuilder<E,B>>

All Superinterfaces:
IsElement<E>, TypedBuilder<E,B>
All Known Implementing Classes:
HTMLContainerBuilder, HTMLElementBuilder, HTMLInputElementBuilder, HTMLSelectElementBuilder, HTMLTextAreaElementBuilder, Link
public interface ElementHTMLMethods<E extends Element, B extends TypedBuilder<E,B>> extends TypedBuilder<E,B>, IsElement<E>
Provides methods and default implementations for modifying the inner HTML of an element.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    default SafeHtml
    html()
    Retrieves the current inner HTML of the element as a SafeHtml object.
    default B
    html(SafeHtml html)
    Modifies the inner HTML on the element using Element.innerHTML.

    Methods inherited from interface org.jboss.elemento.IsElement

    element

    Methods inherited from interface org.jboss.elemento.TypedBuilder

    that

  • Method Details

    • html

      default B html(SafeHtml html)
      Modifies the inner HTML on the element using Element.innerHTML.
      See Also:
      • https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Element/innerHTML

    • html

      default SafeHtml html()
      Retrieves the current inner HTML of the element as a SafeHtml object.
      Returns:
      a SafeHtml instance containing the current inner HTML of the element.
